message: Hi Bob, I'm offering my product to you for $9,000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know your thoughts!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,500. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $7,500 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $8,500 to make this deal work.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let me know what you think.
I'm still interested in the product, but I really think $8,000 is the maximum I can pay. I'd be willing to make a serious commitment to buy the product if you're willing to meet me at that price.
